info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:46PM EDT until June 26 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nelson County in central Virginia... Southeastern Augusta County in western Virginia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 745 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Montebello, or 13 miles north of Forks Of Buffalo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Stuarts Draft, Sherando, Wintergreen, Montebello, Lyndhurst, Nellysford and Tyro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
